name: Lost in the Furniture
description:
Help the staff navigate through the infinitely large store!

This is a game jam entry. The game jam had the theme “SCP”, where I based my game off SCP-3008, also known as the infinite IKEA.

Download link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VdcSpSTsFnjGGVuVZjI7gAlLzxWQY5bb/view?usp=shari...
